job.title: React Native Engineer
job.description:
Title:
React Developer
Location:
Remote
Salary:
$50 - $66/hour
Requirements:
ReactJS, React Native, JavaScirpt
If you are a React Developer and you're looking for a new career opportunity, with a company that has been listed as a Top 5 workplace in Austin for 3 years running, then this message is for you!! THIS IS A REMOTE POSITION! This is a contract position that will last until the end of the year. Hourly Rate of 50-66 per Hour!
We're are building an automated loan system for commercial size financial institutions, and we provide a financial software piece that streamlines our products as well as solutions through the software.
For this role, we are looking for Engineers who can design, implement, integrate, test, and deliver software applications leveraging our proprietary framework.
So, if this sounds like something you'd be interested in pursuing, please continue reading on!!
What You Will Be Doing
Developer will work closely with the Product Owner to groom user stories - estimating, providing detail, and adding acceptance criteria.
Participate as a member of a cross-functional Agile team consisting of software engineers, a scrum master, and a product owner
What You Need for this Position
Strong experience working with ReactJS or React Native
Experience with multiple JavaScript application frameworks, debugging tools, and unit testing frameworks.
Delivered Enterprise Applications is preferred, not 100% necessary
Experience writing Mobile Applications is a plus.
What's In It for You
$50-66/ Hour
Work Full Remote
So, if you are a React Native Engineer with experience you may either
Apply directly to this job opening here!
Or
E-mail directly for more information to Steve.Nash@cybercoders.com
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Steve.Nash@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SN1-1649146 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Steve Nash - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
